title: Bridging the gulf between code and behavior in programming
proctitle: CHI '95: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Henry Lieberman
authors.institution: Media Laboratory, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, Mass.

authors.name: Christopher Fry
authors.institution: Harlequin, Ltd., 1 Cambridge Center, Cambridge, Mass.

references.text: Hiralal Agrawal, Richard deMillo, and Eugene Spafford, An Execution-Backtracking Approach to Debugging, IEEE Software, May 1991.]]

Robert Balzer, EXDAMS, EXtensible Debugging and Monitoring System, Spring Joint Computer Conference, 1969.]]

W. Wayt Gibbs, Software's Chronic Crisis, Scientific American, Sept 1994.]]
E.P. Glinert, ed, Visual Programming Environments: Applications andIssues, IEEE Press, 1991]]

Henry Lieberman, A Three-Dimensional Representation for Program Execution, in {7}.]]

Donald Norman, Cognitive Engineering, in Donald Norman and Stephen Draper, eds. User Centered System Design, Lawrence Erlbaum Assoc. 1986.]]
Dennie van Tassel, Program Style, Design, Efficiency, Debugging andTesting, Prentice-Hall, 1974.]]
